column1: Table 6a. Nicaragua: Operations of the Consolidated Public Sector, 2017–27
(Millions of Córdobas, unless otherwise specified; GFSM 2001)
Sources: National authorities and IMF staff calculations.
Includes the state-owned airport (EAAI); ports (EPN); oil (PETRONIC); electricity generation, transmission and regulation (ENATREL, ENEL and INE); water and sewer (ENACAL); food (ENABAS); trade and
public enterprise corporation (ENIMPORT and CORNAP); telecommunications (TELCOR); technological institute (INATEC); post (CORREOS); and lottery (LOTERIA).
